title: Purchase RP not working

replies.body: when i click on it nothing happens

Hi, same here.
Did you fix the problem?

Hey there,

We've followed this up and it seems you've transferred your account recently, more than likely this is the cause of your issues.

You'll have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support as they're the only ones who can assist with account related issues.
